name: @eclipse-dash/nodejs-wrapper
description: Node.js wrapper for dash-licenses, that makes it easier to perform license checks for JS/TS Eclipse Foundation projects

scripts.version:major:
lerna version major --exact --no-push --yes -m "[Release]: v%s #major

GitHub workflow shall publish and tag upon merge."
scripts.version:minor:
lerna version minor --exact --no-push --yes -m "[Release]: v%s #minor

GitHub workflow shall publish and tag upon merge."
scripts.version:patch:
lerna version patch --exact --no-push --yes -m "[Release]: v%s #patch

GitHub workflow shall publish and tag upon merge."

author: Ericsson and others
